mapper.select: SELECT c.cid, c.uid, c.cname, c.headimgurl, c.content, c.comment_type AS "commentType", c.reply_uid AS "replyUid", c.reply_name AS "replyName", c.create_time AS "createTime" FROM dynamic_msg_comment c WHERE c.mid=#{mid} ORDER BY c.cid DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT c.cid, c.uid, c.cname, c.headimgurl, c.content, c.comment_type AS "commentType", c.reply_uid AS "replyUid", c.reply_name AS "replyName", c.create_time AS "createTime" FROM dynamic_msg_comment c WHERE c.mid=#{mid} AND c.cid < #{cid} ORDER BY c.cid DESC LIMIT 20
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dynamic_msg_comment ( mid, uid, cname, headimgurl, content, comment_type, reply_uid, reply_name ) SELECT #{mid}, u.uid, u.nickname, u.headimgurl, #{content}, #{commentType}, #{replyUid}, #{replyName} FROM system_user AS u WHERE u.uid = #{uid}
